activateAccountMaxBuySize(bool).details: enable/disable rule. Disabling a rule will save gas on transfer transactions.

params._on: boolean representing if a rule must be checked or not.

activateAccountMaxSellSize(bool).details: enable/disable rule. Disabling a rule will save gas on transfer transactions.

params._on: boolean representing if a rule must be checked or not.

activateTokenMaxBuyVolume(bool).details: enable/disable rule. Disabling a rule will save gas on transfer transactions.

params._on: boolean representing if a rule must be checked or not.

activateTokenMaxSellVolume(bool).details: enable/disable rule. Disabling a rule will save gas on transfer transactions.

params._on: boolean representing if a rule must be checked or not.

checkTradingRules(address,address,bytes3.details: This function consolidates all the trading rules.

params.action: if selling or buying (of ActionTypes type)

getAccountMaxBuySizeId().details: Retrieve the Account Max Buy Size Rule Id

getAccountMaxSellSizeId().details: Retrieve the Account Max Sell Size Rule Id

getTokenMaxBuyVolumeId().details: Retrieve the Account Max Buy Size Rule Id

getTokenMaxSellVolumeId().details: Retrieve the Account Max Sell Size Rule Id

isAccountMaxBuySizeActive().details: Tells you if the Account Max Buy Size Rule is active or not.

returns._0: boolean representing if the rule is active

isAccountMaxSellSizeActive().details: Tells you if the Account Max Sell Size Rule is active or not.

returns._0: boolean representing if the rule is active

isTokenMaxBuyVolumeActive().details: Tells you if the Account Max Buy Size Rule is active or not.

returns._0: boolean representing if the rule is active

isTokenMaxSellVolumeActive().details: Tells you if the Account Max Sell Size Rule is active or not.

returns._0: boolean representing if the rule is active

setAccountMaxBuySizeId(uint32).details: Set the AccountMaxBuySizeRuleId. Restricted to rule administrators only.

setAccountMaxBuySizeIdFull(uint8[],uint3.details: Set the AccountMaxBuySizeRule suite for all actions. Restricted to rule administrators only.

params._actions: all the actions to set the rule for
params._ruleIds: rule id's corresponding to each action

setAccountMaxSellSizeId(uint32).details: Set the AccountMaxSellSizeRuleId. Restricted to rule administrators only.

setAccountMaxSellSizeIdFull(uint8[],uint.details: Set the AccountMaxSellSizeRule suite. Restricted to rule administrators only.

params._actions: actions to have the rule applied to
params._ruleIds: Rule Id corresponding to the actions

setTokenMaxBuyVolumeId(uint32).details: Set the TokenMaxBuyVolume. Restricted to rule administrators only.

setTokenMaxBuyVolumeIdFull(uint8[],uint3.details: Set the TokenMaxBuyVolume suite. Restricted to rule administrators only.

params._actions: actions to have the rule applied to
